docs.snippet: THE night sky is clear this time of year and the stars bright, especially Venus over there in the West. The sky, like a child's  longing, is boundless. Through a telescope, it moves closer, becomes more comprehensible....
docs.lead_paragraph: THE night sky is clear this time of year and the stars bright, especially Venus over there in the West. The sky, like a child's longing, is boundless. Through a telescope, it moves closer, becomes more comprehensible.

docs.snippet: John Hubley, a leading creator and producer of animated films, died Monday night during heart surgery at the YaleNew Haven Hospital. He had homes on East 72d Street and in Montauk, L.I. He was 62 years old....
docs.lead_paragraph: John Hubley, a leading creator and producer of animated films, died Monday night during heart surgery at the YaleNew Haven Hospital. He had homes on East 72d Street and in Montauk, L.I. He was 62 years old.

headline.main: John Hubley, 62, Leading Creator, Producer of Animated Films, Dies

docs.snippet: Special to The New York Times TORREMOLINOS, Spain Larry  Christiansen of Modesto, Calif., broke clear of the field to take the lead after 11 rounds of the Costa del Sol International Tournament here in the Cervantes Hotel. His 8-3 score put him a ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Special to The New York Times TORREMOLINOS, Spain Larry Christiansen of Modesto, Calif., broke clear of the field to take the lead after 11 rounds of the Costa del Sol International Tournament here in the Cervantes Hotel. His 8-3 score put him a point ahead of Florin Gheorghiu of Roumania and me.

headline.main: Chess:; Sacrifice-Filled Mate Attack Leaves No Room for Error

docs.snippet: The wife of Carlos Alberto Torres, the man being sought in connection with terrorist bombings that have occurred in New York and in other cities over the last three years, has disappeared, the police said yesterday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The wife of Carlos Alberto Torres, the man being sought in connection with terrorist bombings that have occurred in New York and in other cities over the last three years, has disappeared, the police said yesterday.
docs.abstract: wife of Torres has disappeared; Oscar Lopez Rivera, assoc of Torres, has also disappeared and is being sought (S)

headline.main: Wife of Man Sought in Bombings Has Disappeared, Police Report

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Feb. 20 The third terrorist attempt in less than a year to kill President Jorge Rafael Videla and the kidnapping of a prominent labor leader have dramatized Argentina's continuing political insecurity and violence....
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Feb. 20 The third terrorist attempt in less than a year to kill President Jorge Rafael Videla and the kidnapping of a prominent labor leader have dramatized Argentina's continuing political insecurity and violence.
docs.abstract: repressive campaign against terrorism by Argentine Govt has failed to stem political violence; 3d assassination attempt against Pres Jorge Rafael Videla in less than yr cited; terrorism seen intensifying emotional attitude among mil, leading to counterviolence; videla's policy, favoring moderation, in face of mil demands for drastic measures, noted; recent kidnapping of Peronist labor leader Oscar Smith discussed (M)

headline.main: VIOLENCE CONTINUES IN ARGENTINE POLITICS; Government Drive on Guerrillas Fails to Halt Terrorist Acts

docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES You look too old to be a cop," says the wise-guy young gardener to Art Carney's Ira Wells, the broken-down private eye in the new hit film. "The Late Show." "Don't worry," replies Wells, "this is just a disguise."
